table.name: vtiger_bhsshippingpending
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsshippingpending` ( `bhsshippingpendingid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhsshippingpending_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsshippingpendingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhsshippingpendingcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhsshippingpendingcf` ( `bhsshippingpendingid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhsshippingpendingid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
